title: LinkedIn OAuth Connection and Profile Import Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully connect their LinkedIn account via the import wizard and import profile data with accurate field mapping.

steps.description: Navigate to the LinkedIn import wizard.
Initiate LinkedIn OAuth login and authorize JobMatch AI access.
Check that OAuth connection completes successfully and user is redirected to the profile import step.
Trigger profile data import.
Verify the imported data fields (work experience, education, skills) are correctly populated in the user profile.

title: LinkedIn OAuth Connection Failure Handling
description: Verify the system handles LinkedIn OAuth failures gracefully and informs the user with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt LinkedIn OAuth login but simulate user denial or expired token.
Verify the system displays a clear error message indicating the failure reason.
Check that user remains on the import wizard for retry.

title: AI-Powered Resume Variant Generation and Editing
description: Check that the AI-powered resume editor generates multiple relevant resume variants tailored to selected jobs and allows user edits.

steps.description: Open the resume editor after selecting a job.
Generate AI resume variants using the application generator.
Verify that multiple variants are presented with relevant job-specific content.
Edit one of the generated resume variants by modifying text and sections.
Confirm edits are saved successfully and reflected in the preview.

title: Resume Export in PDF and DOCX Formats
description: Validate that the user can export resumes in both PDF and DOCX formats correctly, maintaining layout and content integrity.

steps.description: From the resume preview page, choose to export the resume as PDF.
Check that the generated PDF file downloads successfully and opens with correct formatting.
Repeat the export process for the DOCX format.
Verify the DOCX file is downloaded and editable in word processing software without issues.

title: Job Discovery Search, Filter, and Compatibility Scoring
description: Ensure the job discovery interface supports keyword search, multiple filters and displays accurate AI-powered job match scores and skill gap badges.

steps.description: Navigate to the job discovery page.
Input search keywords and apply filters for location, job type, and experience level.
Verify that job listings update dynamically based on search and filters.
Check that each job listing displays a compatibility score and skill gap badges accurately reflecting user's profile.

title: Application Generator Creates Tailored Job Applications
description: Test that the application generator creates tailored resumes and cover letters with multiple AI variants for a selected job and allows form-based editing.

steps.description: Select a job from saved jobs and initiate new application creation.
Generate AI variants for resume and cover letter.
Verify multiple AI-generated variants are produced for both documents.
Edit the generated cover letter in the form editor.
Confirm changes persist and document remains valid.

title: Comprehensive Application Tracker Status Lifecycle
description: Validate that application tracker supports full status lifecycle updates including applied, interviewing, rejected, offer, and accepted states with UI and backend consistency.

steps.description: Create a new tracked application.
Update application status sequentially through all lifecycle states.
Verify status is updated correctly in UI and stored persistently in the database.
Check that invalid state transitions are prevented.

title: Application Tracker Follow-up Reminders and Notes
description: Check that follow-up reminders can be scheduled and notified, and users can add interview and contact notes effectively.

steps.description: Set a follow-up reminder for an application.
Verify that reminder notification triggers at the scheduled time.
Add notes including interview details and contact information.
Check notes are saved and displayed correctly in the tracker detail view.

title: Subscription Limits Enforcement and Upgrade Flow
description: Ensure that feature access is properly gated based on subscription plan tiers, with clear prompts and seamless upgrade from Basic to Premium.

steps.description: Log in as a Basic freemium user.
Attempt to use a feature gated for Premium users only.
Verify user receives clear message about limitation and option to upgrade.
Complete subscription upgrade to Premium tier.
Confirm gated features become accessible immediately after upgrade.

title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Enablement and Enforcement
description: Verify that 2FA can be enabled/disabled in security settings and is enforced upon login for enhanced account security.

steps.description: Navigate to account security settings.
Enable 2FA using an authenticator app.
Verify 2FA is enabled and user is prompted for authentication code on next login.
Log out and attempt to log in again.
Verify user is required to enter 2FA code and login succeeds only after correct code entry.
Disable 2FA from security settings.
Confirm 2FA is disabled and subsequent logins do not require code.

title: Session Management and Active Sessions Control
description: Test that users can view active sessions in account security and revoke any device sessions as needed.

steps.description: Log in from multiple devices or browsers.
Navigate to active sessions list under security settings.
Verify all current active sessions are listed with device and location information.
Revoke one or more active sessions.
Check that revoked sessions are immediately logged out and no longer active.

title: GDPR-Compliant User Data Export
description: Confirm that users can request export of their personal data in compliance with GDPR and receive complete, accurate datasets.

steps.description: Navigate to privacy settings.
Request export of all personal data.
Verify export request is accepted and user is notified upon completion.
Check the exported data is comprehensive, well-structured, and includes profile, applications, jobs, notes, and subscription info.

title: GDPR-Compliant User Data Deletion
description: Verify that users can request deletion of their personal data and account, and data is fully removed from the system as per GDPR regulations.

steps.description: Navigate to privacy settings.
Request deletion of user account and associated data.
Confirm user is informed about deletion consequences and confirms request.
Verify that user data is purged from database and user access is revoked.
Attempt to log in with deleted account credentials.
Ensure login fails and user receives account not found error.

title: Bulk Application Status Update and Follow-Up Reminders
description: Test bulk actions on application tracker for status updates and follow-up scheduling to improve user productivity.

steps.description: Select multiple applications in the tracker list.
Bulk update their statuses to a new state (e.g., 'Interviewing').
Verify all selected applications have updated status and UI reflects changes.
Schedule a follow-up reminder for all selected applications.
Check reminders are properly created and trigger notifications.

title: Performance of Onboarding Completion Metrics
description: Validate that onboarding completion times and related performance metrics meet target benchmarks, ensuring smooth user onboarding.

steps.description: Track the time taken by new users to complete LinkedIn import and profile setup during onboarding.
Compare reported onboarding completion times against performance targets and verify acceptable user experience.

title: Job Application Volume and User Retention Metrics Accuracy
description: Check that the system accurately records and reports application volume per user and supports retention analysis.

steps.description: Submit multiple job applications through the application generator.
Verify that application counts are correctly incremented in analytics dashboard.
Check user retention metrics tracking login frequency and activity.
Ensure retention reports accurately reflect user engagement over time.
